description:
http://anidb.net/ch130774 [Liko] and http://anidb.net/ch130775 [Roy] unravel the mysteries that surround them and encounter http://anidb.net/ch130773 [Friede], http://anidb.net/ch131322 [Captain Pikachu], http://anidb.net/ch131112 [Amethio], and others during their exciting adventures!
Source: The Official Pokémon YouTube channel
